channel.title: I can't run my own servers anymore! Please help!
channel.description:
Ok, I get the message "No response from server-Try using a different world".
I sware, I've done everything right, my server was a hamachi btw, this issue started when I tried to port-forward and I failed(my router is weird). So yeah, anyone know what I can do to fix my pc or whatever issue this is. This happens on any server I try.
Extra info: -Source and client= Torvapkz v3 -I use jdk1.6.0_30(it's better than any newer version)
Thanks, Codscape

item.title: I can't run my own servers anymore! Please help!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

Codscape:

What to you mean connect automatically? And sure, I’ll try using no-ip, I have one. No, the source and client are completely compatible. Sorry if I didn’t say this(I think I did), I had the server running perfectly on Hamachi until I port-forwarded.

don’t use hamachi… and i can help.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't run my own servers anymore! Please help!

item.title: I can't run my own servers anymore! Please help!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

You got ipbanned, by the system, if you’re using 127.0.0.1, then you should connect auto -maticly, or you might be using a client thats not compatible to the source.

Read full topic

Your client is probably trying to connect to something other than 127.0.0.1
